description:
text/template: towards better errors
Give the right name for errors, and add a test to check we're
getting the errors we expect.
Also fix an ordering bug (calling add after stopParse) that
caused a nil indirection rather than a helpful error.
Fixes issue 3280.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e990cf183236 ***

text/template: towards better errors
Give the right name for errors, and add a test to check we're
getting the errors we expect.
Also fix an ordering bug (calling add after stopParse) that
caused a nil indirection rather than a helpful error.
Fixes issue 3280.

R=golang-dev, adg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6520043

subject: code review 6520043: text/template: towards better errors
